alert.note: Alert for Schuyler; Seneca; Southern Cayuga; Steuben; Tompkins; Yates (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 19 at 9:02AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...AN AREA OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT SOUTHERN SENECA...SCHUYLER... YATES...SOUTHERN CAYUGA...NORTHEASTERN STEUBEN AND NORTHWESTERN TOMPKINS COUNTIES... At 901 AM EST, an area of heavy snow was located along a line extending from near Geneva to near Naples. Movement was east at 40 mph. Locations impacted include... Penn Yan, Hector, Romulus, Starkey, Enfield, Benton, Covert, Locke, Genoa and Ledyard. Be prepared for hazardous driving conditions. Consider delaying travel if you will be going through this area of heavy snow. Visibilities are near zero in this area of heavy snow. If you are driving, slow down and be on alert for other motorists. Low visibility shortens the amount of time you have to react to situations. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Schuyler; Seneca; Southern Cayuga; Steuben; Tompkins; Yates
